name: Drop pseudo-class
description: The pseudo-class **drop** represents all elements that are drop targets. HTML has a dropzone attribute which specifies that an element is a drop target.
example_description: In this example you could drop images (png, gif, jpeg) to the element with the text which has a blue background color if the browser supports this pseudo-class, the background color changes to yellow in its active state (user were to release the drag), green only matches if the drop target is valid for the currently dragged object and red if it's invalid.
